page.title: 09Children's Games _ Ingleton
page.content: There might be a fielder and he might stump the base you are running to or he might stump you with the the ball. Then you are out.Or you might run round all four bases and then you have scored a rounder. Line Tig: Line tig is a running game. You have to run on lines.You can not run off the lines and you are not allowed to turn back.Someone has to try and touch you.If they touch you then you have to try and touch someone else.The game end when everyone has been caught. Volley ball:For volley ball you need a ball and a large net.You need two teams at either side of the net.You have to hit it to the other side with your fist.If it touches the ground the other side gets a point.
